hero.title: E-book: Sweet Life
hero.subtitle: Indulge in Healthy Protein-Packed Treats
hero.description: Discover 10 delicious protein-rich sweet recipes to diversify your breakfasts, snacks or post-workout meals — supporting your weight loss or muscle-building goals

benefits.benefit-1: Enjoy healthier, sweeter moments with your family
benefits.benefit-3: Lose weight or build lean muscle
benefits.benefit-4: Prevent diseases like obesity, diabetes, and sarcopenia
benefits.benefit-5: Diversify your protein sources throughout the day

recipes.title: Get 10 high-protein sweet recipes with 5 hot and 5 cold options for roughly <highlight>$5</highlight>
recipes.tooltip: Price varies slightly with the exchange rate — around $5

cold-recipes.title: Cold recipes
cold-recipes.description: Fruit Smoothie, Fruit Yogurt, Overnight Oats, Frozen treat, and Chocolate Cup Delight.

hot-recipes.title: Hot recipes
hot-recipes.description: Pancake, Brownie, Mug Cake, Oatmeal Porridge, and Hot Chocolate.

customer-1.name: Giulia Vedovato
customer-1.text: Hey Gi, I made the pancake and loved it. it really satisfies the craving for something sweet, fills you up a lot, and is very easy to make.

customer-2.name: Felipe Augusto
customer-2.text: Gi, I am in love with sweets, especially peanut sweets. I learned the super easy recipe for Frozen treat with peanut butter, and now I can’t stop making it! I highly recommend it!

customer-3.name: Claudia Bassani
customer-3.text: I loved the strawberry smoothie–it looked like a milkshake! Besides being super tasty, it really satisfies hunger! It was also super easy to make!

customer-4.name: Rosângela Araújo
customer-4.text: I like all the recipes in the E-book, but my favorite is the cake with peanut butter; it satisfies my sweet cravings and is still tasty!

customer-5.name: Mariele Aline
customer-5.text: Oh my God, I loved the chocolate in the cup! It’s delicious! Absolutely divine chocolate—simply the best! This combination with grapes is perfection!

customer-6.name: Thais Fernanda
customer-6.text: Hi Gi! I loved the E-book. It has very well-crafted recipes that are filling and also help satisfy that sweet tooth! I loved the yogurt and the smoothie with little fruits, but my favorite recipe is definitely the chocolate mug cake. It’s so good…

about.alt: Gi Toledo in her office holding a delicious shake
about.name: Gisele Toledo
about.from: Brazilian, 47 years old, mother of two
about.bio: With 13+ years in the weight loss industry, I have worked with Herbalife, Hinode, Luci Luci, and Akmos—helping people get fit, feel confident, and enjoy a healthier life without giving up sweetness.Along the way, I’ve also developed supportive wellness programs and launched two community-focused initiatives—the Sweet Life Project and Shielded Women Project—designed to inspire lasting transformation from the inside out.

question-1.question: How to access the e-books after purchase?
question-1.answer: E-books through the email you registered during the purchase (pay close attention to filling in the email field correctly). You can also access your products through the Eduzz website or app.

question-2.question: Is there any warranty?
question-2.answer: Yes, there is a 7-day guarantee. If you conclude that the digital products purchased did not add value to your goals, you can request a refund without any bureaucracy.

question-4.question: Are the recipes suitable for individuals with diabetes, lactose intolerance, or gluten sensitivity?
question-4.answer: Yes, just buy zero sugar, zero lactose (or vegan) and zero gluten ingredients and supplements.

question-5.question: What is the access time for the E-books?
